website_summaries.verdict: If you enjoy the heavy duty charcoal grill design that you can find at a public park, then this option will make you happy.
pros: This heavy duty grill can be permanently mounted into your yard via the steel post
The unit can swivel 360 degrees, is durable, and weighs approximately 65 pounds
The thick, adjustable grate features 4 different cooking levels and a 16-inch by 16-inch cooking surface
cons: Users must be careful not to bump the grill while it in use as the grate can be knocked loose a little too easily

customer_reviews.title: Good value, I could not build one for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the unit, however, I made a change in mounting, I purchased a 5 foot 2" black pipe and cemented it into the ground. Then I removed the mounting bold, drilled a couple of holes in the side of the mounting plate so that I could weld a nut inside and put a bolt through the mounting plate, this way it can be rotated if needed. The 5 foot pipe allowed me to mount it 24" into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Crabb

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: We own 22 wooded acres and recently created a picnic area overlooking our pond. This grill is a great addition to the property for roasting marshmallows, s'mores, and hotdogs. With a family of six we can't do our main grilling on it as the surface area isn't big enough. But, it serves the purpose we had in mind for light duty grilling. The post wasn't long enough for our liking so we did have to modify it in order to cement it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Strope

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty isn't a lie
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I gave the sturdiness a 3 star because the post needs to be longer. As it sits now it's too short which allows for a bit of wobble. I put it in a concrete base which helped some but still isn't as secure as I'd like. The heavy duty construction is nice. It will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother, who lives in NYC with a nice backyard. He is a lover of the hibachi -- artists have to have the real thing, you know :) -- but thought it was time to have something better. Wow, I saw it installed last weekend and have to say it is a thing of beauty and heft. It is large, unbelievable sturdy, and the height is great. Well designed and well built. It does have weight, so prepare yourself when it's delivered. I love this grill and will get one for myself when I move next year.
customer_reviews.author: susanwilmo

customer_reviews.title: GriLLin
customer_reviews.text: its good no doubt, grill will fall off the ledges that hold it so you'll need a way to secure it , I used the clip that goes through the pin on a towing ball mount. still is good , dig a hole put in a 5 gallon bucket , fill with cement and your there.
customer_reviews.author: tony fredricko

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch. Not the grill we ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely unhappy with this bait and switch. The grill I purchased and that is photographed in the ad is not what I received. There is no way to lift the grill grate off the grill to clean it on the one that was sent. The grill in the add has grill grates tilt up and off the grill for ease of cleaning and its not what we received. Very disappointed and will be contacting manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: The food tastes so good when you cook with charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband and he loves his new Park Grill. The food tastes so good when you cook with charcoal. He concreted it into the ground. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice grill and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice grill and very sturdy. The adjustable grate works well but isn't the most secure grate I've seen. The installation of this isn't the most sturdy and has a little wobble to the top, but overall it does the job and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever. I cooked steaks and chicken shishkobabs ...
customer_reviews.text: Will last forever. I cooked steaks and chicken shishkobabs, both well done. The only reaaon for 4 stars is because securing bolt came without nut. Now i have to go to home depot to find one.
customer_reviews.author: yury lapatski

customer_reviews.title: the grill is great but the posts in my opinion had alot to ...
customer_reviews.text: the grill is great but the posts in my opinion had alot to be desired to short to cement in the ground unless you want to cook close to the ground and the swivel design is a joke i bought a pipe so i could cook standing up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really heavy duty grill. Just like the ones you find at a park. I got a hole dug and mounted the two part hole in concrete. Looks great in my yard. I am extremely pleased. I had no idea you could buy these grills. Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: 101st Airborne Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected I was really pleased with the free shipping because its 65lbs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected I was really pleased with the free shipping because its 65lbs. It was also real great to have the pole included in the price
customer_reviews.author: christopher sunda

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty much the same one you see in the parks
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much the same one you see in the parks....lighter gauge steel though. I'm guessing that it will last a good number of years, especially if you keep it covered. I put it at my hunting cabin.....works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cooking like the park
customer_reviews.text: just what my husband wanted, for his yard .A lot of cooking out will now take place. thank you for making a excellent grill.
customer_reviews.author: cin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish the post was about a foot longer to plant in the ground but other than that, love it. The box was absolutely destroyed when I received it but the bbq is so sturdy there wasn’t even a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one to see how it looked and sturdiness We ordered 5 more for the association.
customer_reviews.author: James N.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This grill was an excellent purchase for my Smoky Mountain cabin. Extremely Sturdy and easy to install. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy picnic grill
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this for our apartment complex and are very happy
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Satterly

customer_reviews.title: great  grill
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in no time. It works great for a quick grill an dis duriable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described and shipping was as expected. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: 85% positive review...........just sayin.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad for the 85%, but it sucks to be part of the 15% !

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty! Using for a rental cabin. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hammons

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This grill is an excellent addition for us. Works great it was very easy to install. You don’t have to set the post as deep as recommended. I put mine about 12 inches in the ground. But on a sidenote be sure and use a good concrete and you should be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Jackson

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Heavy Duty Grill
customer_reviews.text: Well built and super cool park style charcoal grill. AA++
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: It's more sturdy than other grills that I had
customer_reviews.text: It's more sturdy than other grills that I had . Looking forward to our guests reaction.A rental on the Outter Banks!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: BBW
customer_reviews.text: This grill requires excavation. Unless you’re a DYI or contractor, nit for you. Seems of sturdy construction. Pacjing box was damaged and gorilla delivered; perhaps given its heft. No Instructions. No website info. BBW.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy duty grill. Should last a long time. Even the grate is heavy duty. Well worth the money. Will be firing it up for the July 4 Holiday.
customer_reviews.author: John Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: We love this Grill! Hardly any maintenance required and was very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Shopper#2

customer_reviews.title: Love the grill
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and high quality! Stands up well to weather
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Anne

customer_reviews.title: I just giving 3 stars because the lack of installation ...
customer_reviews.text: I just giving 3 stars because the lack of installation instructions of this product (there are none) I was able to figure out the way to installed but I think the manufacturer needs to make some improvement on this topic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Grill Chef
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves, loves, just loves this grill. He is the cook of the neighborhood. We grill out just about every evening and he loves cooking on it. He would not have any other grill but this one! If you love to cook outdoors and want a great grill that makes everything taste wonderful buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Like that the grate will go up to put charcoal in then you can set it down to what height you want to grill.

customer_reviews.title: Well Built!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built grills. A beast! Looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: jrbprobbq

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy duty, but I would choose the next size bigger for a family
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seems like a good quality product, relatively easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: karoline w styron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Cooks steaks and hamburgers perfect Just like the ones at parks . Love it.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill
customer_reviews.text: The grill works fine and it is a lot of fun BUT when it arrived it was not in a box or even wrapped in plastic.We had to touch it up with black paint because it was terribly scratched.I have never received anything that wasn't 'packaged.'Also,it is very very heavy so you need to be able to lift it and place it in a hole with concrete mix.Other than that,it is a nice grill.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, well made heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I got one and went back and got 2 more for my friends. Love it, well made heavy duty.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality grill. The package arrived in horrible shape, but the contents were undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Tabo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grill
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, gave updates the entire way. Received grill and set up just in time for dinner! Amazing grill, couldn't be happier and very happy to see how much everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shianne Heath

customer_reviews.title: Grill
customer_reviews.text: What I expected I have another just like it so k ew what I was getting
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: This grill is very heavy which is a plus but the "grooves" that hold the grill plate in place along the back wall are so shallow that in a slightly larger than just a bump to the handles or pressure from from turning the food has every potential of sliding it off the grooves collapsing the plate. :(
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money -- pleased
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Very well made and welded. Exactly what I had in mind. Fast ship. Bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet_Lent

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR OUTDOOR GRILLING
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father in law. he loves it! had to cement it down into the ground, but it works and he is pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: SGP

customer_reviews.title: bulletproof grill
customer_reviews.text: I have several locations set up using 2 3/8" fence posts. Now I can grill wherever I want to around the yard. I only wish it had a cover. This grill will outlive me for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: strong n beefy
customer_reviews.text: Strong, nicely built, not cheaply made. box boke in shipping but bbq and parts made it since its so thick n beefy
customer_reviews.author: mayur raman

customer_reviews.title: l am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: No complaint at all. It is a heavy duty well made.it lasts forever.l am very happy with it.. l recommend to buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Here's the outside grill that you need above all the other outside charcoal grills
customer_reviews.text: It went for a very reasonable price and will last a very long time.

customer_reviews.text: Solid grill , very heavy just like ones in parks

customer_reviews.title: CAM
customer_reviews.text: Have installed these grills on several of our properties and have had nothing but great comments from the users. Great grill and long lasting.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Park style grill
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. Excellent Park style grill. Quality is very good

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I received the Grill promptly after ordering. Great quality and came virtually fully assembled. The only one needs to do is set it on the included pole pedestal. Cons: It arrived unboxed with no instructions (however none instructions are not really needed). Overall it is a great purchase and would but another, only slightly larger.
customer_reviews.author: Billy A

customer_reviews.title: too loose
customer_reviews.text: We had to take the grills to the welder because they where so loose moved about 1 inch each way on the pole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok. As stated but a bit of surface rust as soon as it is exposed to elements.

customer_reviews.title: Campground grill!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter & son in law. They love it! Makes them feel like their at a State park or campground right in their backyard. Shipping was a breeze received it on his birthday!!

customer_reviews.title: works great with wood or charcoal
customer_reviews.text: Ready for some old school grilling, works great with wood or charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lajoie

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product and I highly recommend for anyone interested in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and I highly recommend for anyone interested in a grill using charcoal. Extremely heavy and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a rental cabin and just installed the grill. The problem is that the rack falls off at the slightest touch. We had to wire it on since we don't have time to return it before we leave to go back home. As a result the rack has to stay in the middle position, where we wired it, and cannot be adjusted. Very disappointed. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and they are very nice, sturdy grills.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Wagner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice, both times it was missing the 39 inch post. Returned twice. Will not order again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install after removing the old park style grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Park Style Grill and for the price with free shipping you can`t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: richard brito

customer_reviews.title: park style grill
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, construction is good. Should last for years, if kept maintained. Very easy to install. Would reccomend if you grill alot. Update July2019 grill is in awesome shape
customer_reviews.author: Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks good, although simple, an instruction sheet would be nice
customer_reviews.author: Gennaro Cibelli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and delivery. The only improvement I can think of is brackets added to the grill so they can fall into the slotted bracket to keep the grill from falling all the way to the bottom if moved back a little bit. Over all I'm very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten to little wider one.....
customer_reviews.author: Rosaria Genualdi

customer_reviews.title: great back yard addition
customer_reviews.text: great back yard addition. received it quickly, packaged securely and a good price. we bought one last year for our house and just got another for our property up north. very sturdy and easy to clean , as well as adjust. great for a good ole fashion cook out without all the fuss
customer_reviews.author: ljrplayingames

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well so far and being enjoyed by all
customer_reviews.text: Installed these at our municipal public boat launching area for residents to grill for light picnics while enjoying watching the boaters on the river. Holding up well so far and being enjoyed by all.
customer_reviews.author: Grace A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The cook top will not stay in place and falls during use. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Grill was already rusting
customer_reviews.text: The grill was as pictured, however, it was already starting to rust when we took it out of the box. We had to purchase grill paint and paint the whole thing. This morning, we noticed that the grill area itself looks rusty and the handle was beginning to rust again. We are keeping it, but would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ginger littrell

customer_reviews.title: dangerous unstable
customer_reviews.text: Where the rack sits on the different levels is very unstable and easy to just bump and make the rack fall into the coal messing up your food not to mention it is to a high level dangerous if a child or adult for that matter is standing close and the rack falls the hot coals come flying out and can cause injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Harper

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for our camp
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our camp , very heavy , not made of cheap materials, we slid the pole over a metal fence post so we can remove it for storage when not at camp,,, highly recommended ,,,,
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Dawn

customer_reviews.title: The add states it made of 3/16" steel. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: The add states it made of 3/16" steel. It's only 1/8" steel. Not near what it is supposed to be. Even Titans own web page miss leads the item.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill!!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I LOVE this. It is great for the warmer weather when we can grille, and eat in our picnic tables. Easy clean-up and maintenance. Worth ever penny.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! I'm sure it's going to last a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I'm sure it's going to last a long time. Fast shipping too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: product is very nice I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I paid $137.00 shipping included. I've had this grill about a month used it three times. product is very nice I'm glad I bought it. the last park grill lasted 21 years so its to early how long this will last, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C. Price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Grill - Ideal For Rental Homes
customer_reviews.text: This robust easy to install grill is ideal for rental homes where you don't want guests dragging grills inside pool enclosures and spilling grease all over the deck. Great product, excellent service all round.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lory

customer_reviews.title: Well built grill
customer_reviews.text: Received when scheduled. Grill is well made and all parts fir well. Should last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty construction. This thing should last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the easy of installation and my tenants like having the use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne N.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design and dangerous!!
customer_reviews.text: these grills are very poorly designed and dangerous, the stand pipe is a 2 piece design that has a threaded stud at one end of one pipe and a threaded end female cap on the end of the other pipe that screw togeather to make them swivel, just the least little bump will cause the grate to drop down on the hot coals!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bearinger

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for charcoal grill lovers
customer_reviews.text: Put the pole in a 5 gallon bucket full of concrete and dig a hole in the yard the size and depth of the buck and the grill has held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams
